DOC.detailed_description: To determine whether one subpopulation exist patient diagnosis Interstitial Cystitis ( IC ) base sensory test determine subject IC normal counterirritation-related modulatory system . Previous study PI suggest two population subject present IC population large number subject IC would need test order determine indeed true . Other study demonstrate counterirritation-related effect absent several chronic pain population include fibromyalgia chronic headache . Identification subset IC patient identification failure counterirritation-related effect may predict response therapeutic intervention .
DOC.criteria: Must able read speak English 19 year old IC Diagnosis Over 65 year old Pregnant Children young 19 Significant cardiac disease
